column2: 102] For those reasons, subject to our observations in paragraphs 94, 95
and 96 of this judgment, the determination made by the Board of Review
dated 07.01.2009 is affirmed and the Registrar is directed to send a certified
copy of this judgment to the Tax Appeals Commission.

JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
